welcome.betterOnApp: Touku is better on the app

invitation.findOutAllTheNewWayText: Find out about all the ways you can share your channel and gain more followers. Inviting your channel can be as simple as scanning a QR code or tapping a button. You can then message followers with special information or promotions to grab their attention. More followers makes for a more active account!
invitation.reachOutSocialMediaText: Reach out by social media and email
invitation.copyThisLinkToShareSocialText: Copy this link to share it via social media, email and more to direct users to your account.
invitation.usersCanScanThisImageText: Users can scan this image with a QR code reader to find your account. download the image or copy HTML tag to share it via social media, email and more.
invitation.addButtonToYourSite: Add a button to your website
invitation.usersCanClickOrTabThisButtonText: User can click or tab this button to friend your account copy the HTML tag to add it to website, blogs, ans more

toastr.unableToLoginTryLater: Unable to login. Please try again later.

seo.seoTitle: TOUKU - Free Messaging App | Online Communication Platform
seo.seoDesc: TOUKU is a free messaging app used for instant messaging, sharing photos, videos and group chats with your friends and family. Download it for Android or iOS.
